typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		street as string,
		city as string,
		zip as string,
		state as string,
		beds as integer,
		baths as string,
		sq__ft as string,
		type as string,
		sale_date as string,
		price as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source(output(
		room as integer,
		rdesc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
Lookup1 split(type=='Condo',
	type=='Residential',
	type=='Multi-Family',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Condo, Residential, Multi, Default)
source1, source2 lookup(beds == room,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
ConditionalSplit1@Condo sink(input(
		street as string,
		city as string,
		zip as string,
		state as string,
		beds as string,
		baths as string,
		sq__ft as string,
		type as string,
		sale_date as string,
		price as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Residential sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Multi sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
ConditionalSplit1@Default sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4
